column4: Ok,, grr.. since lucid upgrade,, my touchpad scroll function isn't working
grrr
sony vpcf115fm
Is there a channel with actual developers in it?
So where else can I go for help with my problems?
what is your problem sory?
My virtual terminals don't work. Touchpad on laptop no longer scrolls since lucid upgrade
using what software? virtual terminals meaning what? you have vm's installed on it?
No,, I get a blank screen when I hit ctrl alt f1 and the like
those are your init sessions...
ok sorry. init sessions
that is a video card problem, do you have proprietary drivers
as well do "sudo tail -f /var/log/dmesg /var/log/Xorg.0.log /var/log/syslog" and check the output after you try and switch
Shall I post results?
throw it in pastebin plz
http://pastebin.com/MCL3FTQx
That is output post switch
you need to fix your alsa-mixer --- usb
once that is done you will be set
Any idea where to start?
I would recommend checking and re-installing alsa-mixer and related packages through the repo, as well the proprietary drivers for your nvidia card
I have to run now, but thats your start ;)
